mapper.update: update tb_aircraft_order o set o.state=#{state}, o.updateTime=#{updateTime} where o.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_aircraft_order(userName, userTel, departurePlace, destination, checkStartTime, checkEndTime, peopleNum, createTime, updateTime, state) values(#{userName}, #{userTel}, #{departurePlace}, #{destination}, #{checkStartTime}, #{checkEndTime}, #{peopleNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, 0)
